groovyx.net.http.optional

Class Jackson

  • java.lang.Object
    • groovyx.net.http.optional.Jackson

  • public class Jackson
extends java.lang.Object

    Parser and Encoder methods for handling JSON content using the Jackson JSON library.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Jackson() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void encode(ChainedHttpConfig config, ToServer ts)
      Used to encode the request content using the Jackson JSON encoder.

      static void mapper(HttpConfig config, com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.ObjectMapper mapper, java.lang.Iterable<java.lang.String> contentTypes)
      Used to configure the provided Jackson ObjectMapper in the configuration context for the specified content type.
      static java.lang.Object parse(ChainedHttpConfig config, FromServer fromServer)
      Used to parse the server response content using the Jackson JSON parser.
      static void use(HttpConfig config)
      Configures the client to use the Jackson encoder/decoder for JSON handling, with the default JSON content type.
      static void use(HttpConfig config, java.lang.Iterable<java.lang.String> contentTypes)
      Configures the client to use the Jackson encoder/decoder for JSON handling, with the specified JSON content type.

        the parsed object

      • encode

        public static void encode(ChainedHttpConfig config,
                          ToServer ts)

        Used to encode the request content using the Jackson JSON encoder.

        Parameters:
        config - the configuration
        ts - the server request content accessor

      • mapper

        public static void mapper(HttpConfig config,
                          com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.ObjectMapper mapper)

        Used to configure the provided Jackson ObjectMapper in the configuration context for the default JSON content type.

        def http = HttpBuilder.configure {
    request.uri = "${serverRule.serverUrl}/jackson"
    request.contentType = JSON[0]
    Jackson.mapper(delegate, objectMapper)
}
        Parameters:
        config - the configuration
        mapper - the ObjectMapper to be used.

      • mapper

        public static void mapper(HttpConfig config,
                          com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.ObjectMapper mapper,
                          java.lang.Iterable<java.lang.String> contentTypes)

        Used to configure the provided Jackson ObjectMapper in the configuration context for the specified content type.

        def http = HttpBuilder.configure {
    request.uri = "${serverRule.serverUrl}/jackson"
    request.contentType = OTHER_TYPE
    Jackson.mapper(delegate, objectMapper, [OTHER_TYPE])
}
        Parameters:
        config - the configuration
        mapper - the ObjectMapper to be used.
        contentTypes - the content types to be configured with the mapper

      • use

        public static void use(HttpConfig config)

        Configures the client to use the Jackson encoder/decoder for JSON handling, with the default JSON content type.

        Parameters:
        config - the configuration

      • use

        public static void use(HttpConfig config,
                       java.lang.Iterable<java.lang.String> contentTypes)

        Configures the client to use the Jackson encoder/decoder for JSON handling, with the specified JSON content type.

        def result = http.get {
    Jackson.use(delegate)
}
        Parameters:
        config - the configuration
        contentTypes - the content types to be configured
